attributes.action: limit the pay of all MPs and Ministers to national average wage levels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The purpose of this pay limit is to ensure that all politicians experience the everyday financial issues facing the average person before introducing restrictive laws that have significant affects on the lives of ordinary people. 

In addition, all expenses and allowances must be realistically accounted for in the same way as every employed private citizen including production of detailed receipts and justification for expenditure.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
